name: Reply to Legal Notice (General)
description: General reply to legal notice denying allegations and rejecting demands
body: Subject: Reply to your Legal Notice dated {{notice_date}}
Under instructions from and on behalf of my client {{client_name}}, I write this reply to your legal notice dated {{notice_date}} concerning {{notice_subject}}.
2. At the outset, I am to state that my client denies each and every allegation, assertion, and claim made in your aforesaid legal notice as false, baseless, misconceived, and unsustainable in law.

3. Your notice alleges that {{allegations_summary}}. My client categorically denies these allegations for the following reasons:

{{denial_grounds}}

4. Your demand for payment/compliance, as contained in the said notice, is wholly unjustified, unwarranted, and legally untenable. My client is under no legal or contractual obligation to comply with your demands.

body.text: 5. In fact, it is {{sender_name}} who has {{counter_allegations}}. My client reserves all rights to initiate appropriate legal proceedings against {{sender_name}} for the same.

body: 6. Your legal notice appears to have been issued with the malafide intention of harassing and pressuring my client into making undue payments/concessions.
7. My client reserves all rights and remedies available under law, including the right to claim damages for frivolous and vexatious legal notice.
8. This reply is issued without prejudice to all rights, contentions, and defenses available to my client.
You are advised not to issue any further communication on this matter and desist from making any false, baseless, or defamatory statements against my client.
